question:
(i) Determine whether each species in the following equations is acting as a Br√∏nsted acid or base, and label it. (ii) Indicate whether the equilibrium lies to the left or to the right. (iii) Estimate $K$ for each equation if possible. 
(a) $H_2O + HCN \leftrightarrows H_3O^+ +  CN^-$
(b) $CH_3O^- + NH_3 \leftrightarrows CH_3OH + NH_2^-  $
(c) $HF + CH_3COO^- \leftrightarrows F^- + CH_3COOH$ 
(d) $CH_3^- + NH_3 \leftrightarrows CH_4 + NH_2^-$
(e) $H_3O^+ + Cl^- \leftrightarrows H_2O + HCl$
(f) $CH_3COOH + CH_3S^- \leftrightarrows CH_3COO^- + CH_3SH$
